page.title: 16HOUSING ATTITUDES
page.content:
developed with some 300 houses plus a light industrial estate of 180,000 sq. feet. In consequence new gas and water mains will be required. A new road system to link the village with the A27 which will require a new roundabout. Plans are also in hand for a New Village Centre. This matter having been discussed at the Parish Council Meeting of 24th April, 1985.
Peoples hopes and fears for the future of the village was one of the surveys carried out. Q.Why do you like living in the village A.Quiet;peaceful;rural;small;friendly Q.What do you not like about living in the village. A.It is isolated without personal transport. Insufficient amenities.
